website_summaries.verdict: Easy to apply and remove, this mask is a good choice for at-home spa treatment.
pros: This green mask uses Amazon clay and Moroccan Ghassoul clay
It's a hydrating mask, safe for those with dry skin
The added minerals are meant to enhance the clay's properties, and leave you with supple, bright skin
cons: Has a fragrance that some find overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Use in problem areas only
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product! This worked like a charm after only my second use I used it twice in a week and noticed less redness around my nose and cheeks, and my pores were smaller!!! I used a different product for my blackheads but my face is clearer than it’s been in a while thanks to this mask. V hap, luuuv this ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Islandd

customer_reviews.title: buy it and try it
customer_reviews.text: this mask is light weight, and doesn’t make your face feel super tight. i left it on between 10 and 15 minutes and then wiped it off. it left my skin feeling soft and smooth. i’m liking it so far, and i’ll leave another review in a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, I applied it for the first time and my face felt so smooth after using it. Usually after washing my face I have to do my routine of moisturizing and toning my face because it feels dry. After using this mask, my face was smooth and I did not feel dry at all. I am adding this mask to my weekly routine and using it often. Love the feel on my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Great product..worth the try...I use once a week and I like it after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it! And it smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It works and smells great and doesn't over dry out my skin. It also lasted a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Zev

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting too much but was very happily surprised. It was gentle on my sensitive skin and also helped clear out my rosacea a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: ... a few weeks now and can honestly say I LOVE it! It's lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a few weeks now and can honestly say I LOVE it! It's lightweight, doesn't harden like a lot of other masks and I can definitely tell a difference in my pores already. I use it twice a week and will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Thess0ma

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING is all I can say
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING is all I can say! I have been using the product for a while and my skin has never been better. I have oily skin and the mask works great on me! After using it, my skin feels very soft and feels clean! The mask also smells great. As soon as I finish the one I ordered, I will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Arestova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this ckay!, its soft and I feel the difference everytime I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! Makes my skin feel very soft once I clean it off, and I love the fact that it doesn't dry up while you have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Nesli K

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Feels relaxing when using it. And it sure makes your face feel soft
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Results.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this mask and I didn't notice a difference in my skin after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hetrick-Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Ive used it 3-4 times now and I can feel the difference. My breakouts shrinks in like 24 hours of my first use. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Very good product it really worked so smooth on yr skin. I will order it again for sure
customer_reviews.author: lamiae mfaddel

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PRODUCT✨💚
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this mask! It leaves your skin feeling smooth and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: If you want healthy skin use this
customer_reviews.text: I love the shimmer in the mask. Washed off very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: The Lasstokki clay mask is great! My skin is now super dry due to ...
customer_reviews.text: The Lasstokki clay mask is great! My skin is now super dry due to climate change. This mask does a great job of exfoliating and brightening my skin without over-drying. The price is really great, so I really am surprised how it does to my skin. It does help with texture and the fragrance is really joyful and unique that I keep inhaling when I put on the mask LOL!!! You won’t regret it to have a try.
customer_reviews.author: Betty W.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This clay mask is not what I expected. It had too much fragrance in it. I'm not even sure it is a clay mask. When I removed the mask it made my skin look weird. The claims of it being a clearing, blackhead removal, and moisturizing face mask are false in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: Makes your face feel soft and moisturized. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: blayne

customer_reviews.title: Best clay mask for this price
customer_reviews.text: My wife really enjoy this clay mask. It did a great job for her skin. You cannot get anything better for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Super light but fresh feeling
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask, so refreshing. Light and hydrated. I have a 400 dollars face mask that I normally use but this one feels fresher:) get it you won’t regret
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have...
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of my favorite masks. I have used everything from the cheap masks from Walgreens to Glamglow masks from Sephora, so I have a good idea of what works and what doesn’t. This does what I want, it brightens and clears and just makes my skin glow. It smells amazing which I am usually picky about and prefer fragrance free but this doesn’t bother me, I actually really enjoy the smell. I full recommend this mask for mask lovers like myself.
customer_reviews.author: m_angie

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter... been having a blackhead problem as of late and she informed me she really likes the way it is working so far..guess I'll be getting another jar when this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: christine Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as intended
customer_reviews.text: My wife said it did little to remove her black heads was hoping it would be exactly what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

product_meta.title: Christmas SALE Clay Mask, Lasstokki Green Clearing Clay Mask, Blackhead Removal Moisturizing Face Mask, Gently Exfoliating Mud Mask Without Drying Out Your Skin, Korean Skin Care
product_meta.description: Luxury Clay Mask at an affordable price! Perfect choice for "Valentine's Gift". Lasstokki features a luxurious experience while pure clays and mud act like a magnet to absorb deep oil and impurities. This lifting and firming formula with collagen and blue berry leaves skin feeling vitalizing and refreshing. You would be addicted and relaxed with the incomparable rose and bergamot scent. You will get:-A jar of green exfoliating clay mask, 3.38 oz - Ebook "Can't Keep My Eyes off You - The Secrets to grab attention and attract your date". The ebook will be send to you after order delivery. -100% Satisfaction guarantee. We stand behind our product, we will refund you every penny if you are not satisfied. Click "Add to cart" and get your gift for Valentine!!!!
feature_bullets: 1.AMAZON CLAY & MOROCCO GHASSOUL CLAY - Enriched with abundant minerals, the natural mud absorbs deep oil and impurities, refines skin's texture and pore, boosts radiance to restore a healthy glow.

2.WINTERGREEN & BEETROOT HYDRATES YOUR SKIN – Wintergreen contains nature salicylic acid, helping to balance oil secretion. Beetroot extract is enriched with β-Glucan, which is a superior material to provide skin nature moisturizing barrier from dryness.
3.WALNUT SHEEL POWDER WITH THE FRAGANCE OF CIRCUS AND JASMINE– The scrub gently exfoliates and cleans pores. Chamomile dew enhances the elasticity and brighten the dry, full skin.

4.JEJU SPRING WATER & CRINUM LILY EXTRACT - Crinum Lily serves calmness and moisturize the skin with its mysterious and precious value. With Ph 4.5 ~ 5.5 , Jeju Sparkling Thermal Water can be instantly absorbed by skin, balancing and moisturizing to recovering dryness.
5.EBOOK & 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – Ebook “Can’t Keep My Eyes off You – The Secrets to grab attention and attract your date”. 100% satisfactory guarantee. Click “Add to Cart” now with confidence!
